title: Regulation (EEC) No 2622/69 of the Council of 21 December 1969 amending Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 on the common organisation of the market in milk and milk products
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2622/69 OF THE COUNCIL  of 21 December 1969  amending Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 on the common organisation of the market in milk and milk products
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 14 (1) and Article 15 of Regulation (EEC) No 804/68, the words "until the Community system referred to in the first subparagraph of Article 22 (2) is applied" shall be substituted for the words "until 31 December 1969".

In the second subparagraph of Article 22 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 804/68, the words "until 31 March 1970" shall be substituted for the words "until 31 December 1969".  (1)OJ No L 148, 28.6.1968, p. 13. (2)OJ No L 179, 21.7.1969, p. 13.

With effect from 1 April 1970:    - paragraph 3 of Article 22 of Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 shall be deleted;
- paragraph 4 of Article 22 shall become paragraph 3.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1970.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1969.
For the Council
The President
P. LARDINOIS
